attributes.action: Introduce a 12 months trial of derestricted speed limits on some motorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Introduce a 12 months trial of derestricted speed limits on some motorways in a similar way to the German autobahns. This trial would be to evaluate the potential for a permanent scheme of having some stretches of motorway derestricted. This would be based on the stretch of road currently being statistically safer than most. The trial should be for 12 months to evaluate the safety during different seasons and should be on at least five different motorways at once in order to gain a good cross section of statistics.
